World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest world news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ 2024 年 1 月 2 日星期二 10:00:10 GMT 120
Passengers evacuated from Japan Airlines plane on fire at Tokyo airportA Japan Airlines aircraft was engulfed in flames at Tokyo's Haneda airport on Tuesday after a possible collision with a Coast Guard aircraft, with the airline saying that all 379 passengers and crew had been evacuated. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 09:19:52 GMT 5EXEWXVS3JISFNFZAFPKGYW4NI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/fire-breaks-out-plane-runway-japans-tokyo-haneda-airport-nhk-2024-01-02/Reuters世界亚太地区
Turkey detains 33 people suspected of espionage for Israel's Mossad - state mediaTurkish authorities have detained 33 people suspected of carrying out espionage for Israel's Mossad intelligence service, the state-run Anadolu news agency said on Tuesday, adding 13 others were being sought by police. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 09:19:30 GMT 5A4UHGP75JNUJDKYTQCUCHNHXM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/turkey-detains-33-people-suspected-espionage-israels-mossad-state-media-2024-01-02/Reuters世界中东
Armed drone shot down over air base housing U.S. forces in northern Iraq - sourcesAn armed drone was shot down on Tuesday over Erbil airport in northern Iraq, where U.S. and other international forces are stationed, two security sources said. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 09:11:03 GMT ZFSG67VMLNMRTDYZHQT5T6M5YM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/armed-drone-shot-down-over-air-base-housing-us-forces-northern-iraq-sources-2024-01-02/Reuters世界中东
U.N. to boost food ration for Rohingya refugees in BangladeshThe United Nations will increase the food ration for each Rohingya refugee in Bangladesh by $2 a month, to $10 from Jan. 1, the World Food Programme (WFP) said on Tuesday, as it thanked donors for coming to the rescue of a cash-strapped effort. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 08:55:20 GMT F64XJWRK7ZNSRHNO5DFNSOW6IQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/un-boost-food-ration-rohingya-refugees-bangladesh-2024-01-02/Sudipto Ganguly世界亚太地区
South Korea protests to Japan about tsunami alerts showing disputed isletsSouth Korea has protested to Japan over a tsunami advisory issued by its neighbour following the powerful New Year's Day earthquake that featured a map displaying a group of its islands also claimed by Tokyo, officials in Seoul said on Tuesday. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 08:32:33 GMT 2UPKKZQXVJPKVHZS2JAS63FS6Q https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/south-korea-protests-japan-about-tsunami-alerts-showing-disputed-islets-2024-01-02/Hyonhee Shin世界亚太地区
Disputes over China ties sour Taiwan election campaignBitter disputes on how to handle relations with China and avoid conflict are dominating the final stretch of election campaigning in Taiwan, as some polls show a tight race between the main two contenders to be the island's next president. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 06:46:33 GMT WXNDKD7MFVINPMIBZXUEV5I7FQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/disputes-over-china-ties-sour-taiwan-election-campaign-2024-01-02/Reuters世界亚太地区
Somalia says Ethiopia-Somaliland port deal null and recalls ambassadorSomalia's cabinet said on Tuesday that a pact its breakaway region of Somaliland had signed with Ethiopia allowing it to use the Red Sea port of Berbera was null and void, adding that it endangered the region's stability. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 06:29:01 GMT T4O2RZGYVNPOXLTXRJMKFG4BDA https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/somalias-cabinet-calls-emergency-meet-ethiopia-somaliland-port-deal-2024-01-02/Reuters世界非洲
Syrian military says Israeli attack on Damascus outskirts caused material damage - SANAA Syrian military statement said an Israeli air strike early on Tuesday that came from the direction of the Golan Heights targeting positions in the outskirts of Damascus caused some material damage, Syrian state news agency (SANA) reported. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 05:20:55 GMT FK2PIA66JBLI7OR3O6PY3EIMWM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/syrian-military-says-israeli-attack-damascus-outskirts-caused-material-damage-2024-01-02/Reuters世界中东
Gunmen open fire on villagers in India's Manipur, 3 killedAt least three people were killed and five seriously injured when gunmen in camouflage fatigues opened fire on villagers in the restive northeastern state of Manipur, officials said, as sporadic violence continued. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 05:06:54 GMT M5PQYHMFIFMKFNCQLOMIXPSJVY https://www.reuters.com/world/india/gunmen-open-fire-villagers-indias-manipur-3-killed-2024-01-02/Reuters世界印度
Thailand, China to waive visas for each other's citizens from MarchThailand and China will permanently waive visa requirements for each other's citizens from March, Thai Prime Minister Srettha Thavisin said on Tuesday. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 04:16:02 GMT CNCHISFHI5P5FNY5PPDSFFGVYI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/thailand-china-permanently-waive-visas-each-others-citizens-march-thai-pm-2024-01-02/Reuters世界亚太地区
Hong Kong tycoon Lai pleads not guilty in landmark security trialHong Kong tycoon and pro-democracy advocate Jimmy Lai pleaded not guilty on Tuesday in his landmark trial, where he is accused of endangering China's national security, as prosecutors laid out details of what they said was collusion with foreign forces. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 03:52:36 GMT B2HKYXPKQRKVXIYWEEQ5LTZE4U https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/hong-kong-tycoon-jimmy-lai-pleads-not-guilty-national-security-Trial-2024-01-02/Jessie Pang, Dorothy Kam世界亚太地区
